text: Any way to do surrogate optimization when you have both categorical and continuous factors? e.g. optimizing the yield of a chemical reaction, where you can pick between more than a 100 different ligands, and a continuous temperature range.

elements.text: Any way to do surrogate optimization when you have both categorical and continuous factors? e.g. optimizing the yield of a chemical reaction, where you can pick between more than a 100 different ligands, and a continuous temperature range.

text: I remember there was an open issue on BlackBoxOptim a few months ago talking about categorical factors, have a look there!
